text: “Whatever the work is, do it well—not for the boss but for yourself.” Toni Morrison on the lessons about work, and life, that she learned from her father. https://t.co/GPLe2UVUNk

text: During the 2016 G.O.P. primaries, Mike Pompeo warned voters that Donald Trump would be an “authoritarian President.” Now, according to a former American ambassador, Pompeo is “like a heat-seeking missile for Trump’s ass.” https://t.co/FsiM8FR00P
